Package de.oth.blocklib

Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.GameWindow
public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the game window which is visible on the screen. It contains the GLFW calls.
Since:
2017
Author:
thomas.baer

    • isKeyPressed

      public boolean isKeyPressed​(int keyCode)
      Checks whether a given key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - An int representing the key. This is the GLFW key code.
      Returns:
      Whether the given key is pressed ('true') or not ('false').
